name: BurgerHop
description:
You are Chezy the cheeseburger and are attempting to escape the hands of the humans. Along the way, you try your best to survive by hopping, dodging, and shooting countless hazards that arise in your path while exploring unknown territory.

The game is currently in an early stage, but is very playable. More features and content will be added. The game will be very story driven and be featuring cinematics in-between each new stage/level unlocked!

Here is a little preview of some gameplay, hope you enjoy!

There's much more to come, this game is currently in development.

For more, please feel free to join us on the Discord where updates are posted regularly: https://discord.gg/baQPR2V
